titles.title: Blessing And Honor And Glory Be Thine

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
C
Blessing and honor and glory be Thine
And glory be Thine
And glory be Thine
Blessing and honor and glory be Thine
Both now and evermore

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Let all the saints adore Him
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Both now and evermore, Hallelujah!
